title: An Evening with Saara El-Arifi and Rosie Hewlett
description: Saara and Rosie will unpack their new novels and explore what makes mythology and historical retellings so alluring and why it feels more urgent in 2026 than ever before.

title: Saara in conversation with Jennifer Saint
description: This event will be chaired by Jennifer Saint, author of Ariadne, as she talks with Saara about Cleopatra, followed by audience questions and a signing.

title: Saara in conversation with Laura Steven
description: Join Saara as she talks about her writing, answers audience questions and signs copies of Cleopatra. Guiding the talk is local legend and bestselling author Laura Steven.

title: Saara in conversation with Elodie Harper
description: Saara will be in conversation with Elodie Harper, bestselling author of The Wolf Den Trilogy and Boudicca's Daughter, for an evening of myth and magic followed by book signings.

title: Saara in conversation with Jean Menzies
description: Saara joins the highly acclaimed Jean Menzies to talk about her epic and groundbreaking novel, which shows Cleopatra on her own terms.

title: A Cleopatra Extravaganza: Travel to Ancient Egypt
description: Listen to Saara in conversation with fellow author Nikita Gill, meet her at the book signing and enjoy exclusive activities.
